attributes.action: Referendum on a Vote of No Confidence in the Government with regards to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: If this petition reaches the number for a discussion in parliament, there needs to be a referendum about the people's confidence in the government with regards to the restrictions and handling of COVID-19
attributes.background: With the current climate of scare tactics and a lack of transparency on all information provided by this governments the people should be able to have their say if the Government handling of COVID-19 is the best cause of action or if there needs to be a new government to move forward.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence in individual Ministers or the Government. 

You might like to sign this petition, which calls for a very similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596452.
